page.title: 04Our School's Environment
page.content: Around the hall of our school are 2 patios.One has a fish pond and the other has a pond for frogs.We have 2 playgrounds & a lovely field with 3 climbing frames,a play house,a fort and a boat.We only had a few trees so we planted a little woodland.We have some gardens & an outside swimming pool which we use in the summer.In our class we have pets like gerbils & guinea pigs & we have tadpoles in an aquarium and eggs in our incubator.Hopefully,soon we might have some ducklings and goslings. We have a special lamb called Helen which we saw born on a farm.At our school we do lots of interesting work & have a lot of fun!
